About: If you aspire for a distinguished career in engineering, medicine or the civil services, you can't do better than joining Brilliant Tutorials Kamrup, a peerless, pioneering institution in distance education, the largest of its kind in India. Every year, students from every corner of the country including the Andaman and Nicobar Islands come to Brilliant for help in achieving their career goals. To reach out to these young aspirants, more than 6000 letters and packages are delivered, every day, at rail stations and airports by Brilliant's own fleet of vehicles. Excellent course material, experienced faculty and a committed management have built Brilliant Tutorials Kamrup into the most trusted institution in the area of preparing students for competitive entrance examinations for admission to professional courses. Our faculty comprising 125 experienced professors and lecturers design the curriculum and compile the course material, based on extensive analysis of competitive exams over the years and the latest developments in all the subjects. But wait, the ultimate proof of Brilliant's leadership is here: Year after year, in the most prestigious of competitive exams like IIT-JEE, All India PM/PD Entrance and IAS, Brilliant's students bag the top ranks.
